grails-app.domain.org.grails.plugins.lookups
Class Lookup

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.domain.org.grails.plugins.lookups.Lookup

class Lookup

Contains the enhancements from Kalin Wilson This class uses the LookupValue id property in place of the code property to simplify the lookup model and solidify the database foreign key constraints between LookupValues and where they are used in other classes.
